hotels.vendor_name: Souq Al Wakra Hotel by Tivoli
hotels.title: Five-Star Qatar Seaside Stay near Central Doha with Traditional Qatari Architecture
hotels.description: Embrace Qatari serenity on the gilded Arabian Golf at Souq Al Wakra Hotel Qatar by Tivoli, a five-star seaside oasis near central Doha. Admire Qatari traditions and modern touches inspired by the areaâ€™s rich heritage as a pearl diving and fishing hub, then lose yourself in the bustling souqs nearby. Pamper yourself at the elegant Tivoli Spa before dining at any of the four world-class restaurants serving authentic Middle Eastern cuisine and international dishes.
